name: Samurai Lantern
description:
Embrace your inner samurai and collect those lanterns! Collect them all and exit through the door!

Move - W, A, S, D / Arrow keys / Left stick controller

Jump - Space / Z / C / A Button controller

Attack - E / X / X Button controller

Restrt/Retry - R / Y Button controller

Quit - Escape

Fullscreen toggle - F10 (It looks really good full screened you should try it :)

Controller recommended

SFX: @Noxlof

Music: @KissaKolme
